text: Anyone have a good example of a hubdb foreign table implmentation?
we're building a resource library that connects to related services
I am building a catalog but it isnt done yet.

Challenge for Ya'll :metal:
> Who can give me a 1-2 paragraph explanation of what HubDB is and how it's used? 
> :boom:BONUS:boom: for including helpful links 

(working on "discovery kit" for new-to-HubSpot developers)

HubDB is like HubSpot and Spreadsheets Neflix’d and chilled. Need to display tons of custom data on your site like a staff directory? a store location finder? your favorite sci-fi movies ordered from 1 star to Back to the Future?
HubDB it’s got your back.

You can pull values via HubL - see HubL description - you can pull em via javascript. All with simplified Google Docs like direct editing of the tables. Need to update the tables automatically? There’s an API for that. Need to import a csv with over 15,000 rows, theres a UI for that.

Think you’ve found something HubDB can’t do? Yea right, <@U6GNQ7JBU> just released that feature yesterday. #robot #wizard 

HubDB GET IT!
haha, HubSpot is doing a lot of Netflix'ing and chill'in
This is why I’m not in charge of marketing lol
WHERE WAS THIS  A MONTH AGO MATT! jk, this is awesome and I will totally use this going forward.

Question on a url field. In my hubdb i have  a URL field that links to a zip file in the file manager. if i update my settings for the Default File Manager Hosting Domain will the old `<http://cdn2.HubSpot.net|cdn2.HubSpot.net>` link still work?
